description.en: A Magic Stone that increases your Attack Power (ATK) by 20%. Lasts 1 Hour. If you listen closely, you can hear it humming slightly.
description.ar: A Magic Stone that increases your Attack Power (ATK) by 20%. Lasts 1 Hour. If you listen closely, you can hear it humming slightly.
description.br: Uma Pedra Mágica que acrescenta +20% de Ataque por 60 minutos. Se você escutar atentamente, poderá ouvi-la zumbindo levemente.
description.cns: 增加你攻击力20%(ATK)的魔法石，持续1小时。如果你仔细听，你可以听到它轻微的嗡嗡声。
description.de: Ein magischer Stein, der deine Angriffskraft (ATK) um 20% erhöht. Hält 1 Stunde. Wenn du genau hinhörst, kannst du ihn leicht summen hören.
description.fi: A Magic Stone that increases your Attack Power (ATK) by 20%. Lasts 1 Hour. If you listen closely, you can hear it humming slightly.
description.fil: A Magic Stone that increases your Attack Power (ATK) by 20%. Lasts 1 Hour. If you listen closely, you can hear it humming slightly.
description.fr: Pierre divine augmentant la puissance d'attaque de 20% pendant 1 heure. Si vous écoutez bien, vous pouvez l'entendre ronronner.
description.id: Magic Stone yang meningkatkan Kekuatan Serangan (ATK) sebesar 20%. Berlangsung 1 Jam. Jika kamu mendengarkan dengan seksama, kamu dapat mendengarnya sedikit bersenandung.
description.it: A Magic Stone that increases your Attack Power (ATK) by 20%. Lasts 1 Hour. If you listen closely, you can hear it humming slightly.
description.jp: 1時間、攻撃力を20%増加させる魔法の石。
description.kr: 공격력의 20%를 증가시켜 주는 마법의 돌입니다. 1시간 동안 지속됩니다. 자세히 귀 기울이면, 살짝 흥얼 거리는게 들립니다.
description.nl: A Magic Stone that increases your Attack Power (ATK) by 20%. Lasts 1 Hour. If you listen closely, you can hear it humming slightly.
description.pl: A Magic Stone that increases your Attack Power (ATK) by 20%. Lasts 1 Hour. If you listen closely, you can hear it humming slightly.
description.ru: A Magic Stone that increases your Attack Power (ATK) by 20%. Lasts 1 Hour. If you listen closely, you can hear it humming slightly.
description.sp: Una Piedra Mágica que aumenta tu Poder de Ataque (ATK) en un 20%. Dura 1 hora. Si escuchas atentamente, puedes escucharla tararear ligeramente.
description.sw: A Magic Stone that increases your Attack Power (ATK) by 20%. Lasts 1 Hour. If you listen closely, you can hear it humming slightly.
description.th: หินวิเศษที่เพิ่มพลังโจมตี (ATK) ของคุณ 20% 1 ชั่วโมง หากคุณตั้งใจฟัง คุณจะได้ยินมันฮัมเล็กน้อย
description.tw: 增加攻擊力（ATK）20%的魔法石。 持續 1 小時。 如果你仔細聽，你可以聽到它輕微的嗡嗡聲。
description.vi: Một viên đá ma thuật tăng 20% sức tấn công (ATK) của bạn. Kéo dài 1 giờ. Nếu bạn lắng nghe kỹ, bạn có thể nghe thấy nó ngân nga nhẹ.
